    React Project Setup


    On This Page

    • Local Project Setup


    Local Project Setup

    The officially recommended tool for creating react projects is create-react-app. To create a react app,

    1. Install create-react-app, 
      >npm i -g create-react-app
    2. Run create-react-app, 
      >cd <your_project_base_dir>
>create-react-app my-first-react-app
    3. Start the app, 
      >cd my-first-react-app
>npm start

    Updated: September 02, 2019
